description:
This market will resolve to "Mariano" if between Mariano and Jungleman, Mariano is the player with the higher net winnings at the end of the Hustler Casino's High Stakes Friday game scheduled for 7:30 PM ET, January 9, 2026.

This market will resolve to "Jungleman" if between Mariano and Jungleman, Jungleman is the player with the higher net winnings at the end of the game.

If either player does not participate at all in the Hustler Casino game, this market will resolve to the other player.

If both players' net winnings during the game are exactly equal, or if neither player participates in the Hustler Casino game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The net winnings and the resolution of this market will be determined based on the event's live stream. Only hands played during the live-streamed game will count towards this market’s resolution. If the live stream becomes unavailable, this market will resolve according to official information from Hustler Casino Live.
